docs.snippet: While just 1.6 percent of teams from the four major sports have rallied from a 3-0 deficit to win a series, the N.H.L. has experienced a slightly better victory rate of 2.3 percent....
docs.lead_paragraph: While just 1.6 percent of teams from the four major sports have rallied from a 3-0 deficit to win a series, the N.H.L. has experienced a slightly better victory rate of 2.3 percent.
docs.abstract: New York Rangers face dire odds in their attempt to recover from 3-0 deficit against the Los Angeles Kings for the Stanley Cup; only 2.3 percent of NHL teams in the past have been able to rally from such a deficit in a seven-game series.

headline.main: 3-0 Hole Rangers Inhabit? Only 5 of 320 Teams Have Overcome It
headline.print_headline: 3-0 Hole Rangers Inhabit? Only 5 of 320 Teams Have Overcome It

docs.snippet: Far more fans took the train to the Belmont than railroad officials had predicted, prompting the railroad to summon extra service for the crush at the typically little-used station....
docs.lead_paragraph: Far more fans took the train to the Belmont than railroad officials had predicted, prompting the railroad to summon extra service for the crush at the typically little-used station.
docs.abstract: Far more fans of the Belmont Stakes took the train to Belmont Park than Long Island Railroad officials had predicted, prompting the railroad to summon extra service for the crush at the typically little-used station; tens of thousands of riders struggled to leave, standing in lines for hours.

headline.main: L.I.R.R. Popularity Led to Crush After the Belmont
headline.print_headline: L.I.R.R. Popularity Led to Crush at the Belmont

docs.snippet: Doug Fister flipped the script from his previous start in San Francisco during the 2012 World Series, tossing seven scoreless innings to help the Washington Nationals beat Madison Bumgarner and the Giants 2-1 on Tuesday night....
